titles.title: Raise A Hallelujah
I'm gonna sing in the middle of the storm

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I raise a Hallelujah in the presence of
my enemies
I raise a Hallelujah louder than the unbelief
I raise a Hallelujah, my weapon is a melody
I raise a Hallelujah, heaven comes to fight
for me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I'm gonna sing in the middle of the storm
Louder and louder, you're gonna hear my
praises roar
Up from the ashes, hope will arise
Death is defeated, the King is alive

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I raise a Hallelujah with everything inside of me
I raise a Hallelujah I will watch the darkness
flee
I raise a Hallelujah in the middle of the
mystery
I raise a Hallelujah fear you lost your hold
on me

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Sing a little louder (Sing a little louder)
Sing a little louder (Sing a little louder)
Sing a little louder (Sing a little louder)
Sing a little louder (Sing a little louder)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sing a little louder (in the presence of my
enemies)
Sing a little louder (louder than the unbelief)
Sing a little louder (my weapon is a melody)
Sing a little louder (heaven comes to fight for
me) x2

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:

I raise a Hallelujah
I raise a Hallelujah
I raise a Hallelujah

verse.name: b3
verse.lines:
